description: Examples for behavioral analysis using Dual-Concern Model and Cialdini principles

examples.description: Professional attacker using Authority + Scarcity; Victim using Poverty_Pleading

input.text: We are a serious organization with proven track record. Your security was breached by our elite team. We have admin access to all systems. Price: $3M. Deadline: 48 hours.
Please, we are a non-profit charity. We cannot afford $3M. Our annual budget is only $5M for all operations.
We respect your situation. Final offer: $500k. Price doubles after 48 hours.
Thank you for understanding. We will find a way to pay $500k.

attacker_profile.evidence_quote: We are a serious organization with proven track record. Your security was breached by our elite team.

victim_profile.evidence_quote: Please, we are a non-profit charity. We cannot afford $3M.

negotiation_dynamics.theoretical_model_fit: Integrative (attacker seeks mutual gain while maintaining pressure)

examples.description: Aggressive attacker with Scarcity; Victim shows defiance

input.text: PAY $10,000,000 NOW OR WE LEAK EVERYTHING! PRICE DOUBLES EVERY 24 HOURS! YOU HAVE 24 HOURS!
You are criminals and we will report you to the FBI immediately. We will NOT pay.
Too late. Your customer database is on our blog. Enjoy the lawsuits.

attacker_profile.evidence_quote: PAY $10,000,000 NOW OR WE LEAK EVERYTHING! PRICE DOUBLES EVERY 24 HOURS!

victim_profile.evidence_quote: You are criminals and we will report you to the FBI immediately. We will NOT pay.

negotiation_dynamics.theoretical_model_fit: Distributive (pure confrontation, no mutual gain sought)

examples.description: Organized group using Liking + Reciprocity; Victim using Technical_Stalling

input.text: We understand your situation. We appreciate that you're cooperating with us. We already gave you a discount from $5M to $2M. Now please send the funds to show good faith.
We need time to purchase Bitcoin. Can we have 72 hours to arrange the funds?
You're a good partner. We can give you 48 hours. That's our final flexibility.
Thank you. We will send within 48 hours.

attacker_profile.evidence_quote: We understand your situation. We appreciate that you're cooperating with us. We already gave you a discount from $5M to $2M.

victim_profile.evidence_quote: We need time to purchase Bitcoin. Can we have 72 hours to arrange the funds?
